mapper.insert: insert into product_data(p_no, m_userid, p_name, p_img, p_price, p_dis, p_date, ma_name, m_name, p_content, p_pub, p_ddu) values (#{p_no}, #{m_userid}, #{p_name}, #{p_img}, #{p_price}, #{p_dis}, #{p_date}, #{ma_name}, #{m_name}, #{p_content}, #{p_pub}, #{p_ddu})
mapper.update: update product_data set p_name=#{p_name}, p_img=#{p_img}, p_price=#{p_price}, p_dis=#{p_dis}, p_content=#{p_content}, p_pub=#{p_pub}, p_ddu=#{p_ddu} where p_no=#{p_no} and m_userid=#{m_userid}
mapper.delete: delete from product_data where p_no=${param1} and m_userid=#{param2}
